title: security_purposes
author: security_purposes
content: If you may be interested, we are now allowing NO KYC and low fee's ( over 20 methods of payment ) and trusted over the world.Selling and buying crypto ( Cryptovoucher )NO KYC needed ( max 300 € for user transactions, after that you need KYC. )PAYMENT METHODShttps://ibb.co/QFzFyGmhttps://ibb.co/xF0hTVnExample of API request : ( Will be made by me for each sale, or if you wanna be part of our project I can give  to you link to make request ( IT REQUIRE KYC , and limit after kyc is 10k for month! )https://ibb.co/PzWFf0pEACH REQUEST IS UNIQUE, we operate with fee's from 1% to 3% ( depend from the method used, include withdrawal, using this widget you'll get directly to your wallet instead of our internal one, without any fees. )Every link is unique for each userExample of transaction : (USDC got lowest fees, used that as example. )https://ibb.co/cXGvMsFDiscord : p3rkoc3t1337#4741Telegram: marjadev( for first users, i'll reduce fee's to 0% for any external withdrawal or vouchers crypto ( you only pay fees of method used! )
